metadata.name: Character Shenanigans
metadata.description:
This mod requires REPENTOGON. Press the tilde key to open the new debug console and menu. There's a new Shenanigans option that will let you lock/unlock characters and their completion marks.
This is a companion mod to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2932859748]Win Streak Shenanigans[/url].
Modded characters are now supported.
